title: Emails containing MALETA , Multi Agency Law Enforcement Training Academy or Cockrill Bend

communications.subject: Tennessee Public Records Act Request: Emails containing MALETA , Multi Agency Law Enforcement Training Academy or Cockrill Bend
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Tennessee Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

To Whom It May Concern:
Pursuant to the Tennessee Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:
All emails from Tammy Robins (Tammy.Robbins@tn.gov) which include the keywords “MALETA”, "Multi Agency Law Enforcement Training Academy" or “Cockrill Bend” between Jan 1, 2020 to Sept 28, 2023. Please include all email attachments.
The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.
In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.
Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.
Sincerely,

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kent Hoover, a citizen of Tennessee, in coordination with M Sostre.

title: RFPs for Multi Agency Law Enforcement Training Academy (MALETA) in Nashville, TN

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Tennessee Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

To Whom It May Concern:
This is a request under the Freedom of Information Act. I hereby request the following records:
All proposals submitted for consideration (both denied and approved) in response to SBC Project No.: 529/017-01-2021-06 for the project titled Multi Agency Law Enforcement Training Academy (MALETA) at Cockrill Bend, as well as all response documents and ensuing correspondence relating to those proposals. 
The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.
In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.
Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.
Sincerely,

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kent Hoover, a citizen of Tennessee, in coordination with M Sostre.

title: Emails between Tammy Robins (TN Dept of General Services) and Anecdote Architectural Experience/Anecdote Architectural Experience

communications.subject: Tennessee Public Records Act Request: Emails between Tammy Robins (TN Dept of General Services) and Anecdote Architectural Experience/Anecdote Architectural Experience
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Tennessee Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

To Whom It May Concern:
Pursuant to the Tennessee Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:
All emails which include both Tammy Robins (Tammy.Robbins@tn.gov) and anyone with an Anecdote Architectural Experience email address (*@anecdotexp.com) or anyone with a Anecdote Architectural Experienceemail address (*@ksarchitects.com) as either the sender, recipient, CCed, or BCCed from Jan 1, 2020 to Sept 29, 2023. Please include all email attachments.
The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.
In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.
Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.
Sincerely,

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kent Hoover, a citizen of Tennessee, in coordination with M Sostre.
